name: GhostTrap
description:
Controls

spacebar to restart level

escape to quit

use mouse to do stuff.. explore that

Pick up keys to unlock the green marked rocks when clicking on them.

The gravel falls down. Be aware - you can be trapped if there are stuff around you: north,east,south and west. The character is the ghost. A transparent being. His body is at the surface. Get that and you  become human again. How you died is not known :D

escape the level!

Good luck
